metadata.name: Bright Lights Fleurie Red Vintage 2020
metadata.description:
Liquid Art Club is bringing together rising stars in distillation and wine making with rising stars in the world of art.

In the series Bright Lights, each NFT designed by chinese artist, Jiamin Hu, gives you access to a bottle of 2019 or 2020 vintage from highly esteemed vineyards fronted by young and daring wine makers looking to make a splash in the world of wine.

With your purchase of Bright Lights Fleurie Red Vintage 2020 (Lot #1 - 6/25) , you will unlock a keyphrase to be used when your ready to redeem your 2020 vintage to add to your home cellar.

About the Artist
An up-and-coming Chinese artist based in Lyon, France

Visit www.jiamin.org

The Wine:

Hailing from prized terriors of Beaujolais, France, this red 2020 vintage is hand picked from a family owned vineyard now on their 7th generation of ownership. The domaine is currently headed by a young powerhouse making waves in the world of wine and bringing the prestige back to Beaujolais.

Varietal: Hand harvested 100% Gamay
